item.title: Mavacamten Showing Real-World Success in Treating oHCM
item.description: Two years after being recommended for NHS use, mavacamten is improving outcomes for patients with symptomatic obstructive hypertrophic cardiomyopathy....

item.title: Health Professionals Condemn HHS Firing of ACIP Members
item.description: HHS Secretary provides no evidence of his allegations that the ACIP members are too conflicted to serve. Medscape Medical News

item.title: Research Links Affluence to Higher Scarring Alopecia Risk
item.description: Frontal fibrosing alopecia is more common among patients from affluent zip codes. Medscape Medical News

item.title: New Guidelines Shift Diabetes Care Toward Behavior
item.description: The recommendations focus on helping patients implement lifestyle changes. Medscape Medical News

item.title: Can New Combo Fill ‘Unmet Need’ in R/R Hodgkin Lymphoma?
